query.name: findByPK
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF WHERE EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF_ID = ?

query.name: findAll
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF

query.name: findAllByDefinition
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF Where study_event_definition_id=? order by ordinal asc

query.name: requiredEventCRFDefIdsThatShouldBeSDVd
query.sql: SELECT distinct edc.event_definition_crf_id FROM event_definition_crf edc, study st WHERE edc.study_id = st.study_id and (st.study_id=? or st.study_id=?) and edc.status_id = 1 and required_crf = true and edc.source_data_verification_code in (1,2)

query.name: findAllByStudy
query.sql: SELECT edc.* FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF edc, study st WHERE edc.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) AND edc.status_id=1 order by edc.study_event_definition_id, edc.ordinal asc

query.name: findAllParentsByDefinition
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF Where study_event_definition_id=? and parent_id is null order by ordinal asc

query.name: findAllChildrenByDefinition
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF Where study_event_definition_id=? and parent_id is not null order by ordinal asc

query.name: findAllByDefinitionAndSiteIdAndParentStudyId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF Where study_event_definition_id=? and (study_id=? or study_id=?) and event_definition_crf_id not in (select parent_id from event_definition_crf where study_event_definition_id=? and study_id=?) order by ordinal asc

query.name: findByDefaultVersion
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF Where DEFAULT_VERSION_ID=?

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF (EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF_ID,STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID,STUDY_ID,CRF_ID,REQUIRED_CRF, DOUBLE_ENTRY,REQUIRE_ALL_TEXT_FILLED,DECISION_CONDITIONS, NULL_VALUES,DEFAULT_VERSION_ID,STATUS_ID,OWNER_ID,DATE_CREATED,ordinal,ELECTRONIC_SIGNATURE, HIDE_CRF,SOURCE_DATA_VERIFICATION_CODE,SELECTED_VERSION_IDS,PARENT_ID,EMAIL_STEP,EMAIL_TO,EVALUATED_CRF,TABBING_MODE,ACCEPT_NEW_CRF_VERSIONS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,NOW(),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF SET STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID=?,STUDY_ID=?,CRF_ID=?, REQUIRED_CRF=?, DOUBLE_ENTRY=?,REQUIRE_ALL_TEXT_FILLED=?,DECISION_CONDITIONS=?, NULL_VALUES=?,DEFAULT_VERSION_ID=?,STATUS_ID=?,DATE_UPDATED=?,UPDATE_ID=?, ordinal=?,ELECTRONIC_SIGNATURE=?, HIDE_CRF=?, SOURCE_DATA_VERIFICATION_CODE=?, SELECTED_VERSION_IDS=?, PARENT_ID=?, EMAIL_STEP=?, EMAIL_TO=?, EVALUATED_CRF=?, TABBING_MODE=?, ACCEPT_NEW_CRF_VERSIONS=? WHERE EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF_ID=?

query.name: findAllByEventDefinitionId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM event_definition_crf WHERE study_event_definition_id=? order by ordinal asc

query.name: findAllParentsByEventDefinitionId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM event_definition_crf WHERE study_event_definition_id=? and parent_id is null order by ordinal asc

query.name: findAllByEventDefinitionIdAndSiteIdAndParentStudyId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF Where study_event_definition_id=? and (study_id=? or study_id=?) and event_definition_crf_id not in (select parent_id from event_definition_crf where study_event_definition_id=? and study_id=?) order by ordinal asc

query.name: findAllActiveByEventDefinitionId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM event_definition_crf WHERE study_event_definition_id=? and status_id=1 order by ordinal asc

query.name: findAllActiveParentsByEventDefinitionId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM event_definition_crf WHERE study_event_definition_id=? and parent_id is null and status_id=1 order by ordinal asc

query.name: findAllActiveByEventDefinitionIdAndSiteIdAndParentStudyId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF Where study_event_definition_id=? and (study_id=? or study_id=?) and event_definition_crf_id not in (select parent_id from event_definition_crf where study_event_definition_id=? and study_id=?) and status_id=1 order by ordinal asc

query.name: findAllActiveNonHiddenByEventDefinitionIdAndSite
query.sql: SELECT edc.* FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF edc, study s Where edc.study_event_definition_id=? and s.study_id=? and (edc.study_id=s.study_id or edc.study_id=s.parent_study_id) and event_definition_crf_id not in (select parent_id from event_definition_crf where study_event_definition_id=? and study_id=s.study_id) and edc.status_id=1 and edc.hide_crf = 'false' order by edc.ordinal asc

query.name: findForStudyByStudyEventIdAndCRFVersionId
query.sql: SELECT EDC.*, C.name as crf_name FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF EDC, STUDY_EVENT SE, CRF_VERSION CV, CRF C WHERE EDC.study_event_definition_id=SE.study_event_definition_id AND EDC.crf_id = C.crf_id AND EDC.crf_id = CV.crf_id AND SE.study_event_id = ? AND CV.crf_version_id = ? AND EDC.parent_id is null

query.name: findForSiteByEventCrfId
query.sql: SELECT edc.* FROM event_crf ec INNER JOIN study_event se ON ec.study_event_id = se.study_event_id INNER JOIN crf_version cv ON ec.crf_version_id = cv.crf_version_id INNER JOIN study_subject ss ON ec.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id INNER JOIN event_definition_crf edc ON se.study_event_definition_id = edc.study_event_definition_id AND cv.crf_id = edc.crf_id AND ss.study_id = edc.study_id WHERE ec.event_crf_id = ?

query.name: findByStudyEventIdAndCRFVersionIdAndSiteIdAndParentStudyId
query.sql: SELECT EDC.*, C.name as crf_name FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF EDC, STUDY_EVENT SE, CRF_VERSION CV, CRF C WHERE EDC.study_event_definition_id=SE.study_event_definition_id AND EDC.crf_id = C.crf_id AND EDC.crf_id = CV.crf_id AND SE.study_event_id = ? AND CV.crf_version_id = ? AND (EDC.study_id = ? or EDC.study_id = ?) AND EDC.event_definition_crf_id not in (select parent_id from event_definition_crf where study_id=?)

query.name: isRequiredInDefinition
query.sql: select distinct event_definition_crf.required_crf,event_definition_crf.study_id ,event_definition_crf.parent_id from event_definition_crf, event_crf, crf_version, study_event where crf_version.crf_version_id = ? and crf_version.crf_version_id = event_crf.crf_version_id and crf_version.crf_id = event_definition_crf.crf_id and event_definition_crf.study_event_definition_id = study_event.study_event_definition_id and study_event.study_event_id = ?

query.name: findByStudyEventDefinitionIdAndCRFId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF WHERE study_event_definition_id = ? AND crf_id = ?

query.name: findAllActiveByDefinitionAndSiteId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF WHERE study_event_definition_id = ? AND study_id = ? AND status_id = 1

query.name: findByStudyEventDefinitionIdAndCRFIdAndStudyId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF WHERE study_event_definition_id = ? AND crf_id = ? AND study_id = ?

query.name: findForStudyByStudyEventDefinitionIdAndCRFId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF WHERE study_event_definition_id = ? AND crf_id = ? AND parent_id is null

query.name: findByStudyEventDefinitionIdAndCRFIdAndSiteIdAndParentStudyId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF WHERE study_event_definition_id = ? AND crf_id = ? AND (study_id = ? or study_id = ?) AND event_definition_crf_id not in (select parent_id from event_definition_crf where study_id=?)

query.name: findHiddenCrfIdAndNamesBySite
query.sql: SELECT edc.study_event_definition_id, edc.crf_id, crf.name FROM event_definition_crf edc, crf, study s Where s.study_id=? and (edc.study_id = s.study_id or edc.study_id = s.parent_study_id) and edc.event_definition_crf_id not in ( select parent_id from event_definition_crf where study_id=s.study_id) and edc.status_id=1 and edc.hide_crf = 'true' and edc.crf_id = crf.crf_id

query.name: findByCRFId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF WHERE crf_id = ?

query.name: getCurrentPK
query.sql: SELECT currval('event_definition_crf_event_definition_crf_id_seq') AS key;

query.name: getNextPK
query.sql: SELECT nextval('event_definition_crf_event_definition_crf_id_seq') AS key;

query.name: findAllByEventDefinitionIdAndOrdinal
query.sql: SELECT * FROM event_definition_crf WHERE study_event_definition_id=? AND ordinal=? order by ordinal asc

query.name: findByEventCrfIdAndStudyId
query.sql: select edc.* from event_definition_crf edc, event_crf ec, study_event se, study_event_definition sed, study_subject ss, study s, crf_version cv, crf c where c.crf_id = cv.crf_id and cv.crf_version_id = ec.crf_version_id and ec.study_event_id = se.study_event_id and se.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id and s.study_id = ss.study_id and ec.event_crfId = ? and ec.not_started = false and c.status_id = 1 and cv.status_id = 1 and edc.status_id = 1 and sed.status_id = 1 and sed.study_event_definition_id = se.study_event_definition_id and se.study_event_definition_id = edc.study_event_definition_id and edc.crf_id = cv.crf_id and edc.evaluated_crf = true and edc.hide_crf = false and ((s.parent_study_id is null and edc.study_id = s.study_id) or (not(s.parent_study_id is null) and (edc.study_id = s.study_id or edc.study_id = s.parent_study_id) and edc.event_definition_crf_id not in (select parent_id from event_definition_crf edc where edc.study_id = s.study_id))) and (s.study_id = ? or s.parent_study_id = ?)

query.name: updateEDCThatHasItemsToSDV
query.sql: update event_definition_crf set source_data_verification_code = ? where event_definition_crf_id in (select edc.event_definition_crf_id from event_definition_crf edc, crf_version cv, item_form_metadata ifm where cv.crf_version_id = ? and edc.crf_id = cv.crf_id and ifm.crf_version_id = cv.crf_version_id and ifm.sdv_required = true)

query.name: doesEventDefinitionCRFHaveAvailableCRFVersionsForDataEntry
query.sql:
SELECT (CASE WHEN
(SELECT edc.selected_version_ids FROM event_definition_crf edc WHERE edc.study_event_definition_id = ? AND edc.study_id = ? AND crf_id = ?) IS NULL
OR
(SELECT edc.selected_version_ids FROM event_definition_crf edc WHERE edc.study_event_definition_id = ? AND edc.study_id = ? AND crf_id = ?) = ''
THEN
CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT cv.crf_version_id FROM crf_version cv WHERE cv.crf_id = ? AND cv.status_id = 1) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END
ELSE
CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT cv.crf_version_id FROM crf_version cv WHERE cv.crf_id = ? AND cv.status_id = 1
AND
(',' || (SELECT edc.selected_version_ids FROM event_definition_crf edc WHERE edc.study_event_definition_id = ? AND edc.study_id = ? AND crf_id = ?) || ','
LIKE
'%,' || CAST(cv.crf_version_id AS CHAR(5)) || ',%'))
THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END
END) AS result
